a_sch_cafe01_eve03:
When Rotom enters a microwave, it turns into
Heat Rotom! I heard it even changes type!
a_sch_cafe01_eve05:
I’ve been told there are Pokémon that
camouflage themselves as fruit...
a_sch_cafe01_eve06:
I’m gonna have a good meal and get some Meal
Powers! Maybe that’ll help my grades!
a_sch_cafe01_eve07:
I haven’t even had firsts and I already want
seconds!
a_sch_cafe01_eve13:
Sandwiches you make together taste even better
when you eat them together!
a_sch_cafe01_eve14:
Fruit makes a delicious addition to sandwiches,
you know!
a_sch_cafe01_eve19:
I heard that in other regions, people like to eat
rice covered in this stuff called curry...\c
Have you ever had curry before?
a_sch_cafe01_en01:
I didn’t think it’d be so warm right next to a
refrigerator...
a_sch_cafe01_en09:
Tea time with my Pokémon... Such an elegant way
to pass the hours!
a_sch_cafe01_en10:
It’s quite chic to have tea time at night, don’t
you think?
